original_text: And they put his armor in the temple of their gods and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.
korean_text: 사울의 갑옷을 그들의 신전에 두고 그의 머리를 다곤의 신전에 단지라

sentences.original_text: And they put his armor in the temple of their gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 갑옷을 그들의 신들의 신전에 두었고

sentences.original_text: and fastened his head in the temple of Dagon.
